snippet.title: Why Leaves Really Fall Off Trees : Krulwich Wonders... : NPR
snippet.description: You think you know why leaves fall off trees. Well, you're wrong. It's not the wind. It's not the cold. We call this season the "fall" because all around us right now (if you live near leaf-dropping trees in a temporal zone), leaves are turning yellow and looking a little dry and ...

snippet.description: Why do leaves change color in Fall? Learn why leaves change color and fall off the trees in autumn. Plus, get great science projects.

snippet.title: Why Do Leaves Fall in Autumn? - Softpedia
snippet.description: For a long time, people thought that trees leaves die because the trees enter in a benumbed phase to face the cold season. But in fact, it is not the cold what affects most a tree during the winter but ... drought. Even when the trees live in a wet climate, with an abundant snowfall and rainfall

snippet.title: Why Leaves Change Color - United States Forest Service
snippet.description: What happens to all those fallen leaves? Needles and leaves that fall are not wasted. They decompose and restock the soil with nutrients and make up part of the spongy humus layer of the forest floor that absorbs and holds rainfall.

snippet.title: Why do leaves fall off Trees? - PublicBookshelf
snippet.description: Every fall some trees lose their leaves. Discover why and how. Why do leaves fall off Trees? It is quite commonly supposed that the coloring of autumn leaves and their fall is due to frost.

snippet.title: Why do leaves fall? - Yahoo! Answers
snippet.description: Leaves fall because the length of the day is shortened. Because the daylight is lessened, the availability of light is also shortened. As you know, trees and shrubs use a process called photosynthesis to create food.

snippet.title: Autumn leaf color - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description: Autumn leaf color is a phenomenon that affects the normally green leaves of many deciduous trees and shrubs by which they take on, during a few weeks in the autumn season, various shades of red, yellow, purple, and brown The phenomenon is commonly called autumn colours or autumn foliage in ...

snippet.description: Why are all the leaves falling off my houseplant?
